string-array.name: description
string-array.item: Make sure to sanitize you hands prior and after eating at the restaurant.
An individual is considered to be fully vaccinated after 14 days from 2nd Dose.
Wear your mask prior and after eating at the restaurant.
Please keep a distance of 1.5 metres apart from each other.
Only two person per table is allowed and not more than that.
Scan to checkin and checkout mysejahtera status at this premise

resources.string: You want to make a Reservation
Only Fully Vaccinated Individuals who have completed 14 days since their second dose are allowed in this premise.
